body.p: To be able to deal with changes after a Gentoo release, especially since the Release Engineering Project has decided to use a semiannual release cycle, the Gentoo Documentation Project has separated the installation instructions of the Gentoo Handbooks in two, one for the networkless installation approach closely tied to the latest release, the other one for the Internet-based installation approach which uses the latest versions of all available packages but does not support GRP or networkless installations.
The differences only apply to the installation instructions; the other parts of the Gentoo Handbook remain the same.
